title: Protestants on church and state relationship

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the various Protestant views of the relationship between church and state in the period circa 1500–1700.

frqParts.text:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the various Protestant views of the relationship between church and state in the period circa 1500–1700.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
